params.amountIn_: The exact amount of input tokens to swap
params.amountOutMin_: The minimum amount of output tokens the user is willing to accept
params.swap0to1_: Direction of swap. If true, swaps token0 for token1; if false, swaps token1 for token0

returns.amountOut_: The amount of output tokens received from the swap

params.amountInMax_: Maximum amount of tokens to swap in
params.amountOut_: The exact amount of tokens to receive after swap
params.swap0to1_: Direction of swap. If true, swaps token0 for token1; if false, swaps token1 for token0

returns.amountIn_: The amount of input tokens used for the swap

returns.pools_: An array containing all Pool addresses

getAllPoolAddresses().notice: Get an array of all Pool addresses
